title: Hey riot, this is an event you should do.
body:
scuttle day, kinda like draven day, but scuttlecrab. no changing champion pictures, but every jungle mob is replaced by a big scuttle crab in normals. it would come with a few skins and icons, like a scuttle ward, and a scuttle icons that would look like other icons, and be acheived in the same way, like a santa scuttle that was posed like santa baron, or a scuttle that looked like the vilemaw icon that you got during the harrowing when tt change was still fresh. and then skins, like sejuani riding a scuttle crab or scuttle skarner. there should also be skuttle merch that would come out that day and receive a one day reduction in price, like a scuttle hat and a scuttle plush, and a scuttle figure, and a scuttle tee shirt. and there should be a scuttle login as well, maybe legend of the poro king but call it legend of the scuttle king, and replace poro's with scuttle crabs and use the bilgewater map, maybe change the summoners with shadow dash and super barrier.
